alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:01PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Navajo County through 245 PM MST... At 200 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Linden to near Lake Of The Woods-Pinetop-lakeside. Movement was west at 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, up to half inch hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hondah, North Fork, Lake Of The Woods--Pinetop-lakeside and Fort Apache Reservation. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 356 and 359. State Route 73 between mile markers 354 and 357. Highway 60 between mile markers 319 and 335. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
